content.body:
What is Lorem Ipsum?

Lorem Ipsum is simply dummy text of the printing and typesetting industry. Lorem Ipsum has been the industry's standard dummy text ever since the 1500s, when an unknown printer took a galley of type and scrambled it to make a type specimen book. It has survived not only five centuries, but also the leap into electronic typesetting, remaining essentially unchanged. It was popularised in the 1960s with the release of Letraset sheets containing Lorem Ipsum passages, and more recently with desktop publishing software like Aldus PageMaker including versions of Lorem Ipsum.

Why do we use it?

It is a long established fact that a reader will be distracted by the readable content of a page when looking at its layout. The point of using Lorem Ipsum is that it has a more-or-less normal distribution of letters, as opposed to using 'Content here, content here', making it look like readable English. Many desktop publishing packages and web page editors now use Lorem Ipsum as their default model text, and a search for 'lorem ipsum' will uncover many web sites still in their infancy. Various versions have evolved over the years, sometimes by accident, sometimes on purpose (injected humour and the like).


Where does it come from?

Contrary to popular belief, Lorem Ipsum is not simply random text. It has roots in a piece of classical Latin literature from 45 BC, making it over 2000 years old. Richard McClintock, a Latin professor at Hampden-Sydney College in Virginia, looked up one of the more obscure Latin words, consectetur, from a Lorem Ipsum passage, and going through the cites of the word in classical literature, discovered the undoubtable source. Lorem Ipsum comes from sections 1.10.32 and 1.10.33 of 'de Finibus Bonorum et Malorum' (The Extremes of Good and Evil) by Cicero, written in 45 BC. This book is a treatise on the theory of ethics, very popular during the Renaissance. The first line of Lorem Ipsum, 'Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet..', comes from a line in section 1.10.32.

The standard chunk of Lorem Ipsum used since the 1500s is reproduced below for those interested. Sections 1.10.32 and 1.10.33 from 'de Finibus Bonorum et Malorum' by Cicero are also reproduced in their exact original form, accompanied by English versions from the 1914 translation by H. Rackham.

Where can I get some?

There are many variations of passages of Lorem Ipsum available, but the majority have suffered alteration in some form, by injected humour, or randomised words which don't look even slightly believable. If you are going to use a passage of Lorem Ipsum, you need to be sure there isn't anything embarrassing hidden in the middle of text. All the Lorem Ipsum generators on the Internet tend to repeat predefined chunks as necessary, making this the first true generator on the Internet. It uses a dictionary of over 200 Latin words, combined with a handful of model sentence structures, to geneate Lorem Ipsum which looks reasonable. The generated Lorem Ipsum is therefore always free from repetition, injected humour, or non-characteristic words etc.

en.name: About
en.title: About Me
en.sub_title: Coding One Day At a Time!
en.content:
{"name": "Swaye Chateau", "about": "

Hello, Swaye here. I am a software developer, who likes to learn and build things, I am currently learning animation and Mandarin. My passion for tech and knowledge is what drives me to constantly want to learn new things and the latest creations out there!!

Being an open individual, I have tailored my site to reflect who I am, you could say this site is my life journal and toy box. I have not invested time into building this site for anyone in particular, unless you know me or are trying to get to know, then welcome to my world!!!

P.S. For those that don't know me, I can be a tad socially awkward... Or maybe more than a tad, I will let you decide that! :p

", "skills": {"title":"Skills (To Pay The Bills)", "intro": "If you are on my site to assess my skills for work, my CV can be found here: Curriculum Vitae"}, "status": "Coding One Day At a Time."}

fr.name: Sur
fr.title: À propos de moi
fr.sub_title: coder un jour à la fois
fr.content:
{"name": "Château de Swaye", "about": "

Bonjour, Swaye ici. Je suis un développeur de logiciels, qui aime apprendre et construire des choses, j'apprends actuellement l'animation et le mandarin. Ma passion pour la technologie et le savoir me pousse à vouloir constamment apprendre de nouvelles choses et les dernières créations!

Étant un individu ouvert, j'ai adapté mon site pour refléter qui je suis, on pourrait dire que ce site est mon journal de vie et mon coffre à jouets. Je n'ai pas investi de temps dans la construction de ce site pour quelqu'un en particulier, à moins que vous ne me connaissiez ou que vous n'essayiez de vous connaître, alors bienvenue dans mon monde !!!

P.S. Pour ceux qui ne me connaissent pas, je peux être un peu maladroit socialement ... Ou peut-être plus qu'un peu, je vous laisse décider! :p

", "skills": {"title":"Compétences (Payer les factures)", "intro": "Si vous êtes sur mon site pour évaluer mes compétences professionnelles, mon CV se trouve ici: Curriculum Vitae"}, "status": "À propos de moi"}

ja.name: 約
ja.title: 私について
ja.content:
{"name": "シャトー・スウェイ", "about": "

こんにちは、スウェイ です。私はソフトウェア開発者であり、物事を学び構築するのが好きで、現在アニメーションと標準中国語を学んでいます。技術と知識に対する私の情熱は、常に新しいことやそこにある最新の作品を学びたいと思うように駆り立てるものです

オープンな個人であるため、私は自分が誰であるかを反映するようにサイトを調整しました。このサイトは私の人生日記であり、おもちゃ箱です。あなたが私を知っているか、知りたがっていない限り、私はこのサイトを特に誰かのために構築することに時間を費やしていません。

私を知らない人、私は少し社会的に厄介なことができます。

", "skills": {"title":"スキル (手形を支払う)", "intro": "仕事のためのスキルを評価するために私のサイトにいる場合、私の履歴書はここで見つけることができます 履歴書"}, "status": "1日1回プログラミング"}

content.body: Built with React and vanilla css, I chose to complete this project after failing an interview. I saw it as a good oportunity to go over the basics and brush up on popular frameworks.
